awards_landing_empty_description_text: Check back soon to see the next CubeIndex Awards timeline.
awards_landing_empty_title_text: No awards events are scheduled right now
awards_landing_hero_lead_text: The CubeIndex Awards honor the most innovative, beloved, and collectible puzzles of the year. Nominate your favorites, and vote with the community.
awards_landing_hero_title_h1: Celebrate the Cubes that Redefined the Season
awards_landing_previous_intro_text: Revisit winners, finalists, and standout community moments from earlier seasons.
awards_landing_trailer_prompt_text: See the release trailer on Youtube.
awards_vote_categories_hint_text: Choose a category to view nominees and submit your vote.

dashboard_cta_description_text: Find cubes to add to your collection.
dashboard_intro_text: Here’s your personal overview and recent activity.
dashboard_recent_empty_text: Share cubes that are missing from the catalog and track their status from here.
errors_bug_report_prompt_text: If you think this is a bug, please let us know!
errors_encountered_text: It seems you encountered an error.
explore_achievements_empty_body_text: We couldn't find any achievements matching your search or filters. Try adjusting them or resetting to see everything.
explore_achievements_hidden_description_: Unlock this achievement to reveal its name and description.
explore_achievements_intro_text: Unlock achievements by participating in the CubeIndex community. Collect them all to showcase your journey.
explore_compare_empty_text: Select at least one cube to compare.
explore_compare_intro_text: Select up to two cubes to view specifications side by side.
explore_cube_about_summary_text: . It is {magneticState}, {smartState}, and {wcaState}. Currently {availabilityState} with a community rating of {rating}/5 and {moddedState} design.

explore_cube_rate_disabled_tooltip_text: Only approved cubes can be rated

explore_cubes_empty_body_text: We couldn't find any cubes matching your search or filters; try adjusting them or resetting to see everything. If the cube you're looking for isn't listed, consider submitting it to help grow our database.
explore_cubes_intro_text: Browse all your favorite cubes by type, brand, or rating.
explore_landing_title_h1: What would you like to explore?
explore_price_chart_empty_body_text: Come back later as we gather more price points.
explore_price_empty_body_text: We'll display shops and prices as soon as we track them.
explore_price_meta_description: Historical price tracking across vendors for this cube.
explore_review_error_body_length_text: Review must be at least {minLength} characters long
explore_review_error_title_length_text: Title can not be longer than {maxLength} characters
explore_review_intro_text: Write a helpful review. Keep it specific: feel, performance, and who it's for.
explore_review_rating_hint_text: Rate each category from 0.5 to 5 stars.
explore_reviews_empty_hint_text: Be the first to share your experience with this cube.
explore_users_empty_body_text: We couldn't find any users matching your search or filters. Try adjusting them or resetting to see everything.
explore_vendors_empty_body_text: We couldn't find any vendors matching your search or filters. Try adjusting them or resetting to see everything.
explore_vendors_intro_text: Find the best shops and trusted vendors in the cubing world.
footer_brand_catch_phrase_text: Track, explore and share your speedcube collection.
home_cta_description_text: Join the CubeIndex community and start tracking your collection, unlocking achievements, and connecting with cubers worldwide.
home_cta_title_h2: Ready to level up your cube game?
home_hero_lead_text: Track your cubes, unlock achievements, and explore the world's largest cube database.
home_partner_algarchive_description_text: The open archive for cube algorithms. Browse community-vetted solutions across every puzzle type, tag them with your average-of-5, and share your PB-crushing secrets.
home_partner_cubingpanda_description_tex: CubingPanda is the go-to community for Rubik's Cube fans at every skill level—whether you're a veteran speedcuber or someone who's never solved a single face.
home_section_achievements_description: Celebrate milestones as you collect, rate, and explore. Unlock achievements for completing challenges and growing your collection.
home_section_achievements_image_alt: Illustration of achievement badges and progress
home_section_collection_description: Catalog your entire puzzle collection. Track conditions and personal notes, then share with friends to showcase and brag!
home_section_collection_image_alt: Illustration of a personal collection dashboard with categorized cubes
home_section_collection_title: Add and Manage Your Rubik's Cube Collection
home_section_community_description: Discover inspiring collections from across the community.
home_section_community_image_alt: Illustration of community profiles and shared collections
home_section_pricing_description: Know where to buy. View vendor pricing side-by-side, check availability, and jump straight to the best deal.
home_section_pricing_image_alt: Illustration showing price comparison cards across multiple stores
home_section_ratings_description: Share your experience. Leave ratings and feedback so others can find their perfect main — your opinion makes the database better for everybody.
home_section_ratings_image_alt: Illustration of rating stars and feedback cards
home_stats_achievements_description_text: Earnable today based on your collection & activity.
home_stats_cubes_description_text: Cataloged across brands, types, and generations.
home_stats_users_description_text: A growing community of cubers worldwide.
home_tiles_achievements_description_text: Earn badges for milestones and rare finds. Show them off on your profile.
home_tiles_collection_description_text: Log every cube with notes and versions. Keep your stash organized and easy to browse.
home_tiles_community_description_text: Follow collectors, share finds, and see how your shelf stacks up worldwide.
home_tiles_explore_description_text: Search the largest cube database. From 2×2 to big cubes and rare mods, it’s all here.
home_tiles_notifications_description_tex: Get updates on releases, alerts, and community news—always right on time.
home_tiles_pricing_description_text: Compare vendors, view price history, and get instant alerts on drops and restocks.
nav_explore_card_achievements_text: Browse achievements, and track community unlock progress.
nav_explore_card_cubes_text: Browse thousands of cubes by brand, type, and community rating.
nav_explore_card_users_text: Explore user profiles, discover top solvers, and see community activity.
nav_explore_card_vendors_text: Find trusted cube shops and compare prices from top vendors worldwide.
nav_explore_keyboard_hint_text: Use arrow keys to navigate options
nav_explore_submit_prompt_text: Submit models that are not in the catalog and help keep CubeIndex updated.
notifications_mark_read_error_text: Failed to mark notifications as read.
notifications_resend_success_text: Verification email sent. Check your inbox.
notifications_verify_description_text: Please verify your email to unlock all features.
privacy_section_changes_content_html:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be
posted here with the updated date.
privacy_section_children_content_html: CubeIndex is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13. If you believe a child under 13 has provided personal data, please contact us at thecubeindex@gmail.com.
privacy_section_collect_content_html:
• Account Information: Email address, username, profile picture.
  • Usage Data: Interactions with the site (pages viewed, cubes added, etc.).
  • Device Information: IP address, browser type, and operating system (used for analytics).
privacy_section_contact_content_html: For questions or concerns, email us at thecubeindex@gmail.com.
privacy_section_intro_content_html: We at CubeIndex value your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use the CubeIndex service ("the Service").
privacy_section_rights_content_html:
You can:

  • Access or update your profile at any time
  • Request deletion of your account and data by emailing thecubeindex@gmail.com
  • Note: Deleted content may remain in system backups for a limited time
  • Opt out of analytics tracking (coming soon)
privacy_section_security_content_html:
We use secure infrastructure (e.g., Supabase Auth, HTTPS) and follow
best practices to protect your data.
privacy_section_sharing_content_html:
We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties, except:

  • To comply with legal obligations
  • With third-party tools that power our service (e.g., Supabase, Netlify)
  • When linking to or embedding third-party vendor content or services, which have their own policies
privacy_section_use_content_html:
We use your data to:

  • Operate and personalize your experience on CubeIndex
  • Provide features like collections, profiles, and achievements
  • Improve platform performance, usability, and content moderation
  • Send occasional service-related emails (e.g., login links or updates)
report_bug_expected_placeholder: What did you expect to happen?
report_page_intro_text: Help us improve CubeIndex by reporting bugs or suggesting features.
report_signin_required_text: You must be signed in to submit. Please log in to continue.
status_construction_body_text: We're currently working hard to finish this part of the site. Check back soon for something awesome!
submit_autofill_warmup_text: Warming up the autofill service. It can take up to a minute to be ready.
submit_checklist_item_one_text: Confirm the model name, release date, and specs against manufacturer documentation.
submit_checklist_item_three_text: Explain relationships to existing cubes when submitting mods, trims or limited editions.
submit_checklist_item_two_text: Upload imagery that is free to share and clearly shows the retail product.
submit_duplicate_error_text: This cube already exists in our database.
submit_feature_discontinued_helper_text: The manufacturer no longer produces this cube.
submit_feature_modded_helper_text: Community or premium mod rather than stock hardware.
submit_feature_stickered_helper_text: Ships with factory stickers instead of tiles or primary plastic.
submit_feature_wca_legal_helper_text: Approved for use in official competitions.
submit_features_intro_text: Mark every hardware capability that ships with this cube.
submit_field_brand_helper_text: Missing a manufacturer? Let the team know through the cube report button or Discord and we will add it for you.
submit_field_image_url_helper_text: Use an official product or press image.
submit_field_related_model_helper_text: Only approved cubes appear here. Select the base model this release is derived from.
submit_field_type_helper_text: Need another cube type? Let the team know through the cube report button or Discord and we will add it for you.
submit_form_error_text: Please fix the highlighted fields and try again.
submit_help_prompt_text: Need direct help? Contact us on
submit_identity_intro_text: Tell us how the manufacturer refers to this cube.
submit_media_specs_intro_text: Share reference imagery and key physical attributes.
submit_next_steps_item_one_text: Our reviewers check your submission for accuracy and completeness.
submit_next_steps_item_two_text: Approved cubes go live on CubeIndex with credit to your profile.
submit_page_intro_text: Provide accurate manufacturer details so the CubeIndex team can review and publish your cube quickly. Double-check specs before you send them.
submit_server_error_text: An error occurred while submitting the cube
submit_slug_error_text: Unable to derive a slug from the provided model details.
submit_submit_helper_text: It may take up to a week for your submission to be approved.
submit_success_message_html: Cube submitted for review! Track its status on your submissions page.
tos_section_acceptance_content_html:
By accessing or using CubeIndex (“the Service”), you agree to be bound by these
Terms of Service (“Terms”). If you do not agree, do not use the Service.
tos_section_accounts_content_html:
• You are responsible for all activity under your account.
  • You must keep your login credentials secure.
  • You agree to provide and maintain an accurate and valid email address.
  • Account deletion from within the app is not yet available. You may request deletion by emailing thecubeindex@gmail.com.
  • There is currently no policy on inactive accounts. If this changes, we will update these Terms and notify you.
tos_section_api_content_html:
Limited, low-volume scraping for personal, non-commercial use is allowed provided it:
  • is infrequent and does not degrade performance;
  • obeys robots directives and rate limits;
  • targets public pages only;
  • does not attempt to bulk export;
  • stops immediately if requested.
tos_section_changes_content_html: We may update these Terms from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with the “Last updated” date. Material changes may be notified in the Service or by email. Continued use after changes means acceptance of the revised Terms.
tos_section_contact_content_html: Questions about these Terms? Contact us at thecubeindex@gmail.com.
tos_section_content_license_content_html:
You retain ownership of the content you submit (e.g., reviews, images, comments).
By submitting content, you grant CubeIndex a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free
license to use, host, reproduce, modify (for formatting/display), publicly display,
and distribute your content within the Service and in materials that promote the
Service. This license ends when your content is removed, except for necessary backups.
tos_section_description_content_html: CubeIndex provides a database for speedcubing products and tools for managing cube collections, viewing product information, and participating in community features such as profiles and achievements. The Service is offered for personal, non-commercial use unless we give you prior written permission.
tos_section_eligibility_content_html: You must be at least 13 years old to use CubeIndex. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13. If you believe a child under 13 has provided personal data, please contact us at thecubeindex@gmail.com.
tos_section_governing_content_html: These Terms are governed by the laws of the European Union and the Member State where CubeIndex is established. Disputes will first be resolved amicably within 30 days; otherwise, arbitration or local courts may apply depending on applicable law.
tos_section_guidelines_content_html:
• No harassment, hate speech, or threats.
  • No spam, scams, deceptive practices, or mass unsolicited messaging.
  • No illegal content, malware, or attempts to gain unauthorized access.
  • No sexually explicit or pornographic content.
  • Respect intellectual property; do not upload copyrighted materials without permission.
tos_section_indemnification_content_html:
You agree to indemnify and hold CubeIndex harmless from claims, damages, and expenses
arising out of your violation of these Terms or infringement of third-party rights.
tos_section_liability_content_html: CubeIndex accepts liability to the extent required by law, including for negligence or breach of obligations. However, CubeIndex will not be responsible for indirect or consequential losses where exclusion is permitted by law.
tos_section_moderation_content_html: CubeIndex may, at its sole discretion, remove or restrict any user content without prior notice if we believe it violates these Terms or applicable law, or to protect users or the Service.
tos_section_open_source_content_html:
The CubeIndex software is open source and made available under the Apache License, Version 2.0. See apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.

Trademarks & hosted service: CubeIndex trademarks, logos, brand assets, and hosted service configuration are not granted under Apache 2.0.
tos_section_privacy_content_html: Your use of the Service is also subject to our Privacy Policy, which explains how we handle your data.
tos_section_quality_content_html: We aim to operate CubeIndex with reasonable skill and care, but the Service may be interrupted, delayed, or experience errors (e.g., maintenance, updates, or network issues).
tos_section_security_abuse_content_html:
• Impersonating others or misrepresenting your identity or affiliation.
  • Interfering with or overloading the Service (e.g., DDoS, abusive rate-limiting circumvention).
  • Reverse engineering or probing to bypass security or access controls, except as permitted by law.
tos_section_third_party_content_html: The Service may display links to third-party vendors or websites (e.g., stores with cube pricing). Those services have their own terms and policies, and CubeIndex is not responsible for them.
user_profile_private_description_text: You do not have permission to view this user's profile.
user_settings_about_footer_text: CubeIndex is built by cubers for cubers. If something feels off, please report it so we can fix it quickly.
user_settings_about_intro_text: CubeIndex helps cubers track collections, explore detailed cube data, and follow price history across stores.
user_settings_about_open_source_links_pr: Browse the code, open issues, or submit pull requests on
user_settings_about_open_source_text: CubeIndex is released under the Apache License 2.0. Contributions are welcome, from small fixes to new features.
user_settings_about_privacy_footer_text: We regularly ship updates to improve stability, performance, and accessibility.
user_settings_about_privacy_text: You control who can see your profile. Switch your profile to private anytime in the Profile tab.
user_settings_appearance_intro_text: Choose a theme you like. You can also follow your system.
user_settings_avatar_helper_text: Supported: JPG, PNG, WebP, AVIF. Max size 2MB.

user_settings_privacy_toggle_label: Make my profile private (only visible to me)
user_settings_profile_bio_placeholder: Tell us something cool... Markdown is supported
user_settings_profile_intro_text: Update your public profile details. Your bio supports Markdown formatting (bold, italics, links, lists, and code). See quick tips below.
user_settings_security_intro_text: Change your password. Keep it unique and strong.
user_settings_social_intro_text: Share where people can find you online.
